Description: Unglazed pottery oil lamp; wheel-made; light grey clay fabric; covered all over (except the rim) with a dark slip; globular body with a rising rim for the filling hole, large loope handle, large spout and flat base
Curator's comments: Cf. R. Mason & J. Tugwell, 'Fatimid Tall-Necked Lamps and Their Associates: A Typology', Journal of the American Research Center in Egypt 47 (2011) 335-53, esp. 341-4.
